title: Liberia: Agriculture Contributed 3.4 Percent to Liberia's Economic Growth in 2024
description:
A recent report published by the World Bank says Liberia's economy grew by 4.0 percent in 2024 with the agricultural sector accounting for 3.4 percent, a notable improvement from 1.4 percent in 2023.

This overall growth was led by the rubber and rice sectors. According to the report, titled "From S...

title: Liberia: Justice Minister Tweh Accused of Blocking LRA Revenue Collection, Shielding LPRC From National Budget Obligations
description: Monrovia – Allegations have surfaced that Liberia’s Justice Minister, Oswald Tweh, interfered with the Liberia Revenue Authority’s (LRA) efforts to collect lawful revenues from state-owned enterprises (SOEs), including the Liberia Petroleum Refining Company (LPRC), raising concerns over fiscal accou...

title: Liberia: Executive Agencies to Face Lawmaker’s Wrath As US$ Budget Realization Faces Huge Challenge
description:
Monrovia – A preliminary report on the Revenue Component of the Draft FY2026 National Budget by the Committee on Ways, Means and Finance (WMF) predicts a scary sign in achieving the proposed US$1.2 billion.

By Emmanuel Weedee-Conway
